case_title: AVADESH KUMAR UPADHYAY vs COMMISSIONER OF INCOME TAX
legal_question: Whether, on the facts and circumstances of the case, the Tribunal was right in law in holding that the cash credit in the name of Sint. Memo Deyi amounting to Rs. 21,000 remained unexplained?
directive: Income Tax Appellate Tribunal to draw up a statement of the case and refer the above question for opinion
